verses.roman:
eta śuni' mahāprabhu saroṣa-antare
jagadānande kruddha hañā kare tiraṣkāre

synonyms: eta śuni'-hearing this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sa-roṣa-antare—in an angry mood; jagadānande—at Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; kruddha hañā—becoming very angry; kare tiraḥ-kāre—chastises.
translation: Hearing this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, in an angry mood, began to chastise Jagadānanda Paṇḍita.
